p: Despite the fact that podcasting has been around for over 15 years and there are already many podcasts, the space is not overcrowded and is still growing steadily. Podcasting increased in popularity in the mid-2000s with the advent of broadband Internet access and portable digital audio playback devices such as the iPod (Hammersley 2004). Today, there are over 1,700,000 podcasts (Listen Notes 2020).
